Detailed Description

Class contains initialisation code, drag-and-drop features and event handling. Fergus Morrow fergus@enopen.co.uk

Definition at line 27 of file InvisiView.h.

Member Function Documentation

- (NSDragOperation) draggingEntered: (id <NSDraggingInfo>)  sender  

Is a required method for the Drag and Drop functionality. It is called when a Draggig Operation enters the NSStatusItem.

Parameters:
sender - the sender of the operation.
Returns:
No return value.

- (void) gotScreenRequest

- (void) hotKeyCallback  

Is a callback function for the "HotKey" class. It is called when a HotKey event occurs.

Returns:
No return value.
- (id) init  

Initialisation code - sets up the NSStatusBarItem, configures Drag-n-Drop, calls the Carbon code for HotKeys..

Returns:
An instance of itself.

- (void) logIn: (NSString *)  user
password: (NSString *)  pass
typeOfPass: (int)  type 

Logs the user in with the remote PHP server

Parameters:
user the username to authenticate with
pass the password to authenticate with (either plain text, or its hash)
type either _PASS_DECRYPT_ or _PASS_HASH_
